entry.title: Marthin Luther King
entry.summary: Next Year on January 16 2023, it is Marthin Luther King Day. I like what MLK said “I have a Dream”. A Dream means, you will try what you can do to catch your dream, even if you never get there. Just like MLK did, service people do not impact immediately, but for the long term, that may help a lot of people, you do service not only for yourself, it is for the world. If you could go back in tim...
